You may type the word "Home" to go back to the main menu

The Mazda 3 aspires to compete with more premium cars—and in many ways it does. The 3 is available as either a sedan or a hatchback, and both are equally as handsome and agile. Two four-cylinder engines are offered, including a punchy turbo, and you can even have all-wheel drive if you want—though that means skipping the excellent six-speed manual.

Mazda’s compact sedan and hatchback look sharp, feel upscale, and are lovely to drive, traits that make the 3 special in the world of small cars.
If you would like to book a Mazda 3,simply type "Book Mazda 3"

For breakdowns or technical issues, let us know the following here in this chat and we will dispatch a technical team to assist: 
1. Location of the breakdown
2. Details of the breakdown (for e.g., punctured tyre, brakes not working, steering alignment issue)

agent_available.message: Thank you for the patience. Our technical expert is online.

agent_unavailable.message: Thank you for the patience. We are trying to find you an agent

values.text: You may type the word "Home" to go back to the main menu
Please wait a moment. We are transferring you to a GetGo agent.

For breakdowns or technical issues, let us know the following here in this chat and we will dispatch a technical team to assist. Remain calm and type the following details here so that we can assist accordingly: 

1. Location of the breakdown, vehicle number and mechanical issue you are facing. If you are still able to move the vehicle, ensure that you drive onto the road shoulder and have your hazard lights turned on 

2. Details of the breakdown if you know the issue (for e.g., punctured tyre, brakes not working, steering alignment issue) 

You may type in a response like this example (SLP3453W breakdown along Sheares Avenue before Bayfront Avenue exit)

We can assist to see if one of our Honda Vezels are available. 

Simply type in your desired booking time and date in this format: DD/MM/YYYY at XXam to XXpm OR Today at XXam to XXpm

For example if you need a vehicle today between 2pm to 4pm, type: Vezel 2pm to 4pm today
For example if you need a vehicle on 01/09/2022 between 2pm to 4pm, type: Vezel 2pm to 4pm 01/09/2022
Our pleasure. Is there anything else I can help you with a booking?

You are in luck! We have a Honda Vezel available from 2pm to 4pm today. 
Vehicle Number: SMR8076C

1. Please make your way to our showroom at 50 Paya Lebar Road (S840392) and register at our office. 
2. Snap 4 images of the car as follows and upload via our web app to complete your booking: 
A) Front 
B) Back
C) Left Side
D) Right Side
Happy Driving!
We have two models available for rental. You can choose between a Honda Vezel or a Mazda 3.

Completely redesigned and re-engineered, the all-new Honda Vezel exudes a more angular, straight-edged look and horizontally themed layout cabin. This latest generation Vezel is a combination of compact and exceptionally spacious vehicles, conquering every family journey with exemplary and excellent driving capabilities.

Producing 116 horsepower and a maximum torque of 142 Nm, this subcompact SUV houses a reliable 1.5-litre 4-cylinder inline DOHC i-VTEC mated to a Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT). It also boasts a new e:HEV hybrid powertrain to deliver a smooth ride, crisp acceleration and a refreshed interior for a maximum sense of openness. 

The new Honda Vezel is a combination of practicality and functionality of a coupe, SUV and minivan to provide dynamic handling and class-leading comforts for up to five passengers on board.
If you would like to book a Honda Vezel,simply type "Book Vezel"
Hello and welcome to GetGo. You can book a car directly through our web app in 3 simple steps. If this is your first time renting with us, here are some handy tips.

The new Honda Vezel is a combination of practicality and functionality of a coupe, SUV and minivan to provide dynamic handling and class-leading comforts for up to five passengers on board.
If you would like to book a Honda Vezel,simply type "Book Vezel"

GetGo is conveniently located at #01-100, 50 Paya Lebar Road
Singapore 409050

24-hour hotline: 6545 6789
Operating Hours:

We can assist to see if one of our Mazda 3s are available. 

Simply type in your desired booking time and date in this format: DD/MM/YYYY at XXam to XXpm OR Today at XXam to XXpm

For example if you need a vehicle today between 2pm to 4pm, type: Mazda today from 2pm to 4pm
For example if you need a vehicle on 01/09/2022 between 2pm to 4pm, type: Mazda 2pm to 4pm 01/09/2022

Our rates are: 
1. Fee per hour at $ 6
2. Mileage at $ 0.39 per km. There is no capacity limit imposed on rental. You will be charged for the distance driven.

For e.g., if you made a booking on Monday, 2pm to 4pm, and travelled 20km, you would pay:(2 hours x $ 6) + (20km x $ 0.39) = $ 19.80

Note: All prices stated are inclusive of GST
You may type the word "Home" to go back to the main menu

Singapore 409050

Operating Hours:
Daily including public holidays: 10AM – 7PM

Two four-cylinder engines are offered, including a punchy turbo, and you can even have all-wheel drive if you want—though that means skipping the excellent six-speed manual.


Mazda’s compact sedan and hatchback look sharp, feel upscale, and are lovely to drive, traits that make the 3 special in the world of small cars.
